message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $10,000 by you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it can bring to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional opportunity.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, but my budget is capped at $10,000. I'd be willing to pay $9,800 to make this deal work. What do you think?
